APP.MENU.APPS.MY_APPS_TEXT: Here are your activated apps. Press the button on the right to activate the sort mode. If you want to remove an app, swipe from right to left over the name of the app.
APP.MENU.APPS.OTHER_APPS_TEXT: Here are the remaining apps that you have not installed yet.
APP.MENU.BETS.BANNER_INFO: The shopping center is the official sponsor of the betting game in the Rotblau app.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.ADMIN.TITLE: Admin
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.BETS.GAMES_TEXT: Here you can see all games of the betting group with your predictions. Tap on a game to make your bet.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.BETS.TITLE: Bets
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.COMMENTS.TITLE: Chat
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.HOME.BET_GAMES_TE: Here you can bet on the current games. Press «bets» below to see all games and your results.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.HOME.DETAILS_TEXT: The following games are bet on:
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.HOME.STATUS_DENIE: You have been removed from this group.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.HOME.STATUS_REQUE: You have not been accepted into the group by the admin yet.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.HOME.STATUS_UNKNO: You are not a member of this betting group.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.HOME.TITLE: Home
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.RANKING.TEXT: Here you can see the ranking of all members of the betting group. The data is updated at least once a day.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.RANKING.TITLE: Ranking
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.RULES.BASIC_TEXT:
Points are added up during the entire duration of the betting game of a betting group. This is how you may collect points per game:

  • Correct winner: 5 points
  • Correct amount of goals per team: 2 points each
  • Correct goal difference: 1 point
Thus, you may reach a maximum of ten points per game, if the result was correctly predicted.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.RULES.GROUP_TEXT: Each betting group distributes points in the same way, but different games chosen. All details of a betting group are on its home page.
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.RULES.GROUP_TITLE: Rules specific to a betting group
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.RULES.TITLE: Rules
APP.MENU.BETS.BETGROUP.TITLE: Betting group
APP.MENU.BETS.MY_BETS_TEXT: Here you can see the current games of your betting groups with your bets. You can tap directly on a game in order to bet on it.
APP.MENU.BETS.MY_GROUPS_TEXT: You are a member of the following active betting groups:
APP.MENU.BETS.OTHER_GROUPS_TEXT: Here you may find all active betting groups. Official groups of Rotblau are decorated with a check sign.
APP.MENU.FCBLR.TITLE: FCB Live Radio
APP.MENU.FOOTBALL.GAME.SUMMARY.BETS_TEXT: Here you may see bets of other users. The average bet for this game is {{averageBet}}.
APP.MENU.FOOTBALL.GAME.SUMMARY.NO_BETS_I: As soon as the first bet has been given, a graphic appears here.
APP.MENU.FOOTBALL.GAME.TICKER.OLD_TICKER: This ticker is made by a machine. Until we have migrated our own FCB ticker to the new system, please click on the button below to get the old ticker.
APP.MENU.FOOTBALL.GAME.TICKER.SPONSOR_TE: This ticker is created together with «bajour».
APP.MENU.HOME.PROFILE.PRIVACY_TEXT: Due to this user's privacy settings, you will not be able to see content until you follow him.

APP.MODAL.ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.USER_ACTIVATE: For certain functions (eg posting, commenting) we would like to check your account. Please enter your mobile phone number or e-mail address to unlock all features.
APP.MODAL.BETGROUP.DATA_TEXT: Choose a title for the betting group (eg. "FCB Season 19/20") and describe the group in a few words. Additionally, you can define whether the group should be public or private. If your betting group is private, you will need to confirm every single user who wants to join the group.
APP.MODAL.BETGROUP.DETAILS_TEXT: Choose the betting details here. You can make a betting group for a season (eg. Champions League 19/20) or for a team (eg. FC Basel). If you choose only a team, you also have to define a start date and an end date (eg. 01.01.2019 to 01.01.2020).
APP.MODAL.BETGROUP.TITLE: Create a betting group
APP.MODAL.CONNECTION-ERROR.TEXT: The app could not complete an important request to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
APP.MODAL.CONNECTION-ERROR.TITLE: Error
APP.MODAL.POST.POLL_DURATION_D_M_S: {{ days }} days {{ hours }} hours {{ minutes }} minutes
APP.MODAL.POST.URL_ERROR: This link is invalid. Please insert a valid link which starts with http:// or https://.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.ACCOUNT_PRIVATE_TEXT: The following data is not shared. E-Mail and mobile number serve for verification and account recovery.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.ACCOUNT_PUBLIC_TEXT: Here you may define your public account data. If you set your profile type to «Private», then other people can only see your posts if they follow your account.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.ADDRESS_TEXT: Here you may add your address data. Only first name and last name are visible by other users. All other fields are only for the correspondence of Rotblau (eg. betting game).
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.COLOR_PICKER_TEXT: Tap on a color to change your profile appearance.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.EMAIL_REQUESTED_TEXT: The e-mail {{ email }} is temporarily set in our system. We have sent you an e-mail with a confirmation link.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.MOBILE_ERROR_INFO: This mobile phone number is invalid. The valid format is +41791234567.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.MOBILE_REQUESTED_TEXT: The mobile phone number {{ mobile }} is temporarily set in our system. We have sent you an SMS with a confirmation link.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.PASSWORD_TEXT: You have to login to Rotblau with your user name and your password. Here you may change your password.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.PICTURE_PICKER_TEXT: Here you may select a new profile image. After saving, the current image will be replaced.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.USERNAME_ERROR_INFO: A username must consist of at least three characters with at least one letter and must contain only the following characters: a-z, 0-9, dot and underscore.
APP.MODAL.PROFILE.USERNAME_ERROR_NOT_AVA: This username is no longer available.
APP.MODAL.PUSH.INFO_TEXT: Here you may configure when to receive notifications. The settings are valid for all your devices.
APP.MODAL.REPORT.INFO_TEXT: Here you can file a report about content. In order for us to understand and take into account your message, we kindly ask you for detailed information on the violation.
APP.MODAL.REPORT.REPORT_TEXT: You have chosen to report us the following content:
APP.MODAL.REPORT.WARNING_TEXT: Attention: Abuse of this feature may lead to a ban of your account. Please send the form only if there is a violation of our policies or the law.
APP.MODAL.SETUP.PROFILES_TEXT: Here you can select the profiles from which you would like to receive news on your app's homepage.
APP.MODAL.SETUP.USER_RESET_TEXT: You can always log in to Rotblau with your username {{username}} and your password. If you ever forget your details, you will only be able to recover your account by providing your email address or mobile number!
APP.MODAL.SETUP.USER_TEXT: Here you can adjust your username.
APP.MODAL.TEAM.TEXT: Choose teams that you like to track. We will add all results to your app's homepage.
APP.MODAL.TOURNAMENT.TEXT: Choose competitions that you like to follow. The app gives you a quick access to your favorite competitions.
APP.MODAL.WELCOME.EMAIL_TEXT: Type in your e-mail address here.
APP.MODAL.WELCOME.FORGOT_TEXT: Your account can only be restored if you have at least an email or mobile phone number stored in your account. Please select your reset method below.
APP.MODAL.WELCOME.MOBILE_TEXT: Type in your mobile number here.
APP.MODAL.WELCOME.PASSWORD_ERROR_INFO: A password must consist of at least eight characters. The password must include a capital letter (A-Z), a lowercase (a-z), a number (0-9), and a special character (e.g. dot, comma).
APP.MODAL.WELCOME.PRIVACY_TEXT: With your registration you accept our terms of use.
APP.MODAL.WELCOME.REGISTRATION_TEXT: Please sign up with a username and a password.
APP.MODAL.WELCOME.WELCOME_TEXT: Please log in to our system. You only require a user name and a password.
